# id: MultipleAdRealmIT -> public void testCanAuthenticateAgainstBothRealms() throws IOException
commentText: Test that both realms support user login. Implementation wise, this means that if the first realm reject the authentication attempt,_then the second realm will be tried._Because one realm is using "common name" (cn) for login, and the other uses the "userid" (sAMAccountName) [see_{@link #setupSecondaryRealm()}], this is simply a matter of checking that we can authenticate with both identifiers.
codeText: public void testCanAuthenticateAgainstBothRealms() throws IOException {_        assertAccessAllowed("Natasha Romanoff", "avengers")__        assertAccessAllowed("blackwidow", "avengers")__    }
